data.title: Northern District of Texas
data.text:
Office Locations

The Northern District of Texas is comprised of 100 counties located in the north-central part of the State of Texas. The District is divided into seven divisions -- the Abilene Division, Amarillo Division, Dallas Division, Fort Worth Division, Lubbock Division, San Angelo Division, and the Wichita Falls Division. Each of these divisions is comprised of the following counties as listed below.

Abilene Division

The Abilene Division includes the following 13 counties: Callahan, Eastland, Fisher, Haskell, Howard, Jones, Mitchell, Nolan, Shackleford, Stephens, Stonewall, Taylor and Throckmorton.

The Abilene Division is a staffed branch office and is located at: 500 Chestnut Street, Suite 601, Abilene, TX 79602. The phone number is 325-271-6700.

Amarillo Division

The Amarillo Division includes the following 26 counties: Armstrong, Brisco, Carson, Castro, Childress, Collingsworth, Dallam, Deaf Smith, Donley, Gray, Hall, Hansford, Hartley, Hemphill, Hutchinson, Lipscomb, Moore, Ochiltree, Oldham, Parmer, Potter, Randall, Roberts, Sherman, Swisher and Wheeler.

The Amarillo Division is a staffed branch office and is located at: Amarillo National Plaza Two, 500 South Taylor Street, Suite 300, Lobby Box 238, Amarillo, Texas 79101-2446. The phone number is 806-324-2356 and TDD/TTY 806-324-2328.

Dallas Division

The Dallas Division includes the following seven counties: Dallas, Ellis, Hunt, Johnson, Kaufman, Navarro and Rockwall.

The Dallas Division is the District's Headquarters Office and is located at: Earle Cabell Federal Building, 1100 Commerce Street, Suite 300, Dallas, Texas 75242-1699. The phone number is 214-659-8600 or TDD 214-659-8790.

Fort Worth Division

The Fort Worth Division includes the following eight counties: Comanche, Erath, Hood, Jack, Palo Pinto, Parker, Tarrant and Wise.

The Fort Worth Division is a staffed branch office and is located at : Burnett Plaza Suite 1700, 801 Cherry Street, Unit #4, Fort Worth, Texas 76102-6882. The phone number is 817-252-5200 and TDD/TTY 817-872-9146.

Lubbock Division

The Lubbock Division includes the following 19 counties: Bailey, Borden, Cochran, Crosby, Dawson, Dickens, Floyd, Gaines, Garza, Hale, Hockley, Kent, Lamb, Lubbock, Lynn, Motley, Scurry, Terry and Yoakum.

The Lubbock Division is a staffed branch office and is located at: George Mahon Federal Building, 1205 Texas Avenue, Suite 700, Lubbock, Texas 79401-4002. The phone number is 806-472-7351 and TDD/TTY 806-472-7349.

San Angelo Division

The San Angelo Division includes the following 15 counties: Brown, Coke, Coleman, Concho, Crockett, Glasscock, Irion, Menard, Mills, Reagan, Runnels, Schleicher, Sterling, Sutton, and Tom Green.

The San Angelo Division is unstaffed; contact the Lubbock Branch Office at 1205 Texas Avenue, Suite 700, George M. Mahon Federal Building, Lubbock, Texas 79401-4002, phone 806-472-7351.

Wichita Falls Division

The Wichita Falls Division includes the following 12 counties: Archer, Baylor, Clay, Cottle, Foard, Hardeman, King, Knox, Montague, Wichita, Wilbarger and Young.

The San Angelo and Wichita Falls Divisions are unstaffed; contact the Lubbock Branch Office for San Angelo and contact the Dallas Headquarters Office at Earle Cabell Federal Building, 1100 Commerce Street, Suite 300, Dallas, Texas 75242-1699, phone 214-659-8600 or TDD 214-659-8790 for Wichita Falls.
